EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners (1348000712.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Dear Sterling, Hello, my name is Sara Conde, a Consultant Services Advisor with MBO Partners. I received your contact information from Stefanie Hayden. Stefanie has enjoyed our program and thought it would be worthwhile for us to discuss MBO Services <http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zKDzwSTmGv4&hd=1> to see if it is something that you might find valuable. You can schedule a convenient time by using my online calendar. <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS> I look forward to speaking with you, Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
